title: Right is hitting point and click champions
body: by making minions attack them more. %%%%%s. no. get rid of the point and click ffs. Pantheon with lethality is a load of bullshit. His stun is point and click and his spear is point and click. No. get ride of it make him throw his shield to stun. and aim his spear...

replies.body:
Aim his spear? Like nidalee? Sorry that's a big f lawsuit in character design that would be pirating.

But dude just dodge his cursor, dodge his right clicks man, better in fact dodge this game if you see him lmao.
